audiobook.description:
Author(s): Gary Chapman, Ross Campbell Narrator(s): Chris Fabry
You love your child, but does your child feel loved?
 
Every child has a unique way of feeling loved. When you discover your child's love language - and how to speak it - you can build a solid foundation for your child to trust you and flourish as they grow.
 
In this audio book for parents, teachers, single parents, and more, Drs. Gary Chapman and Ross Campbell offer practical advice for how to:
  • Discover and speak your child's love language - in dozens of ways!
  • Use the love languages to help your child learn best
  • Discipline and correct more lovingly and effectively

audiobook.name: The 5 Love Languages of Children: The Secret to Loving Children Effectively
